text: The Confederate Monument in Oxford, Mississippi is installed on the University of Mississippi campus. It was designed by John Stinson and installed in 1907. The monument is being relocated in 2019. ==See also== * 1907 in art * List of Confederate monuments and memorials in Mississippi ==References== Category:1907 establishments in Mississippi Category:1907 sculptures Category:Confederate States of America monuments and memorials in Mississippi Category:Outdoor sculptures in Mississippi Category:University of Mississippi
title: Confederate Monument (Oxford, Mississippi)
